fact_list.fact_text: Warning signs included in the document cover various types of junctions and traffic situations.
Some warning signs indicate the need to slow down due to vehicles from specific directions.
Merging traffic is pointed out as a situation requiring caution and slower driving.
Two-way traffic warnings include slowing down and staying on the left to avoid oncoming traffic.
Warnings for lanes merging suggest caution regarding merging traffic from either side.
